Precautions.title: Stay at Home
Precautions.description: The best way to prevent illness is to avoid being exposed to this virus. And the best to ensure that is to stay at home.

Precautions.title: Wash your hands often
Precautions.description: Wash your hands frequently for atleast 20 seconds thoroughly. Avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth with unwashed hands.

Precautions.title: Wear a cloth face mask
Precautions.description: If at all you need to step out of your home, wearing a cloth face mask is recommended in situations where social distancing is difficult.

Precautions.title: Cover coughs and sneezes
Precautions.description: Always cover your mouth with a tissue or elbow while coughing or sneezing. Dispose off the tissues and wash your hands thoroughly.
